prompt: A mystical swamp scenery filled with ancient trees and glowing plants. At the forefront, a Swamp Witch, known as the Elderwood Enchantress, stands with an aura of subtle power. She wears a robe of moss and vines, adorned with luminescent fungi and ancient runes. The Enchantress has a crown made of twisted tree branches and is surrounded by small, magical fireflies. The misty background adds an eerie yet enchanting feel to the scene. The art style is dark fantasy with vibrant, glowing highlights.
